parts.purpose: Read the passage and decide which is the best answer. Circle the letter A, B, C or D next to the word you choose.
parts.content: Paper is named for papyrus, a reed like plant used by ancient Egyptians as writing material more than 5000 years ago. The Chinese invented the paper that we use 2000 years ago.

questions.content: According to the passage, the paper that we use was first invented by
